description: Daily Show correspondent Roy Wood Jr. is exploring the entertaining world of employment in his new podcast, 'Roy’s Job Fair.' Whether you need a job, hate your job, or need some job tips. We all need to put food on the table. In this episode, Roy talks with an ex-McDonald’s worker who avoided robbers. A non-profit is hiring and reminds Roy of his terrible prostate exam, and an exec from Waffle House finally answers the question of whether or not they actually watch the Waffle House Fight videos. Finally, Black/White Peopleologist Rod4Short joins the show to discuss the Scammer of the week. Hear a new episode of Roy’s Job Fair every Wednesday wherever you get your podcasts.   Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
